result.arabic_text: ۞ قَٰلَ أَوَلَوۡ جِئۡتُكُم بِأَهۡدَىٰ مِمَّا وَجَدتُّمۡ عَلَيۡهِ ءَابَآءَكُمۡۖ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِمَآ أُرۡسِلۡتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ
result.translation: (Uwo muhanuzi) akababwira ati “Ese n’iyo naba mbazaniye inzira iruta iyo mwasanganye abakurambere banyu (mwampakana)?” Baravuga bati “Mu by’ukuri ibyo mutuzaniye turabihakanye.”
